subject: Find that special someone even if you are over 40
body:
Over40Matching.com - Find the one for you!







Over 40? If you are ready to 
meet "The One" and want to establish a relationship, then please 
Visit Over 40 Matching 








If you have any 
questions or concerns, you may contact us at the following address: 
Over40Matching, 1357 BROADWAY Suite 433 NEW YORK, NY 10018

Unsubscribe from Over 40 Matching







Use this link to be automatically removed from any future offers


Remove from  any more offers from via e-mail, please write us with your removal request.  Customer Service 560- A F ST #438 Grants Pass, OR 97528.Please note: It may take up to 3 days for your name to be removed from our list.
